DataElement.preferredName: Pregnancy Person Spontaneous Abortion Stillbirth Present Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the free text field to specify the circumstances of a spontaneous abortion or still birth.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Pregnancy Person Spontaneous Abortion Stillbirth Present
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to pregnancy (the condition of having a developing embryo or fetus in the body) and spontaneous abortion (expulsion of the products of conception before the completion of gestation without deliberate interference) or stillbirth (a natural loss of the products of conception) present (being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The condition of having a developing embryo or fetus in the body, after union of an ovum and spermatozoon. (Dorland, 27th ed):Person; a human being.

Concepts.definition: The state or condition of having a developing embryo or fetus in the body (uterus), after union of an ovum and spermatozoon, during the period from conception to birth.

Property.preferredDefinition: Expulsion of the products of conception before the completion of gestation without deliberate interference.:A natural loss of the products of conception.:Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: Fetal loss at less than 20 weeks of gestation.

A fetus of at least 20 weeks gestation, or of a birth weight of at least 350 grams if the gestational age is unknown, that is born without signs of life at the time of delivery, and with an Apgar score of zero at both one and five minutes.
Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the patient's ability to conceive or nurse offspring and/or their current reproductive status.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the specified free-text field related to a patient/participant's reproduction potential or status.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the patient's ability to conceive or nurse offspring and/or their current reproductive status.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.

Concepts.definition: Be specific about something; define clearly.
